actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Easy Gait
special_abilities.desc: The horse's steps are smooth and steady. A creature riding the horse has advantage on saves against exhaustion caused by a Forced March.
